name: Island Paradise
description:
Island Paradise is a survival game where you build, upgrade and customize your own island and use nearby resources to create a home for future generations!

A strong storm forced the locals to leave the island.
Nature has reborn an ecosystem untouched for hundreds of years...

As you progress you will discover new technologies. You need to build bridges, so you can explore easily!

Island Paradise is a vast and dynamic world with lakes, mountain ranges, caves, forests, jungles and abandoned houses where you can find shelter, food and places to buy and sell products!

Take care of nature and establish new settlements as part of your island building mission!
